titles.title: Equal Access to Social Security Act of 2004

To provide for entitlement to dependents' and survivors' benefits under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program under title II of the Social Security Act based on permanent partnership as well as marriage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 6/24/2004--Introduced. Equal Access to Social Security Act of 2004 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to entitle unmarried gay and lesbian and heterosexual permanent partners to OASDI survivor and other benefits.
